message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering it's worth $8,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe we can come to an even better agreement. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9,500.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down to $9,750. This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us. Let's make this deal happen!
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $9,600 for the product.
